name: Battle EXTREME
description:
Welcome to Battle EXTREME! Enjoy a fast-paced rock, paper, scissors like game, where you are playing against an enemy AI! Do you have what it takes to beat the AI?  This game was made in two hours as part of a speed-making game challenge.

How to play:

There are three cards in Battle EXTREME.

The shoot card - you need at least one bullet to use this card. If you use the shot card successfully you win the round.

The reload card - used to add one ammo (the ammo count is shown in the bottom right).

The dodge card - used to dodge the shot card. If the shot card is selected by your opponent and you select this card, the opponent does not win the round.

The game's score is shown in the top left of the screen.
